markdownRemark.html:
Working as a Software Developer Coach with raise.dev, I get lot of questions from folks trying to land their first job in tech. This is a work in progress post, but as a first step I am trying to compile resources from the community which will help folks in landing their first tech job.

  • Have you helped someone get a job in tech
  • Hire me thread for URMs
  • Stories of how people landed their first tech job

frontmatter.title: How to get the first tech job
frontmatter.spoiler: Resources to help you find your first tech job

frontmatter.title: Grieving over a job break up
